page.title: 13THE ARTS AND ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The{Hexagon}is the largest entertai- ment centre.Opened in 1977,it can sit 1700 and attracts 250,000 each year. It manages over 400 performances/year. These have included Segovia,Genesis, the Royal Philarmonic,Cliff Richard as well as many others.It stages an annual Grand Prix snooker tournament. It is currently staging a National Portrait Gallery exhibition on the Sporting Thirties.There are several local drama&singing groups the St. Laurence Players and Sainsbury Singers being amongst them.{Reading Museum}and Art gallery opened in 1883 and is located in the Old Town Hall.The Sil- chester collection of Roman Antiques was obtained from The Duke of Welling- ton and many fine 19thC oil and watercolours from W.I.Palmer.
